short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Men, you've found your home online.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You're a man, and you speak like a man. Your Internet should, too. Handsome Browser runs in the background and edits the web into something you'll be proud to browse. Just install it and visit your favorite sites!

(P.S. Not all websites are created equal; Handsome Browser favors those that serve up static content. If you visit Twitter, Facebook, search results, etc., you might wonder why Handsome Browser isnâ€™t working. Just visit FoxNews.com instead.)
